ovdesc.p: This module allows the physical deletion of a sort file for both DATA and DICT. It is meant as a convenience to clean up or eliminate outdated work files for print or display. it is an alternative method to executing source, which creates a new sort file or to the reversal function in REPGEN.CREATE which also deletes the report definition file and the source code.
It can only be run on-line. The only input possible is on the action line in the format
where ID is the report name, i.e. the key of the file REPGEN.CREATE.
